Title: This causes trouble! - Lessons from Several Heavy Liability Accidents
Publisher: Liaoning minzu chubanshe (辽宁民族出版社)
Notes: A set of safety production legal education wall charts was compiled and printed in 1987 to cooperate with the implementation of the instructions of the Party Central Committee, the National People's Congress Standing Committee and the State Council to overcome bureaucracy and strengthen safety production.Titled "Illegal operation brings harm to yourself" (违章操作祸及自身), the story is told how, in 1987, in a wire factory, a female employee operated a newly installed machine while, illegally, wearing gloves. She was crushed to death by the machine.
